solution_line_template: Maggie is {juliet_older_than_maggie} years younger than Juliet who is {juliet_age} years so she is {juliet_age}-{juliet_older_than_maggie} = <<{juliet_age}-{juliet_older_than_maggie}={maggie_age}>>{maggie_age} years old
Ralph is {juliet_younger_than_ralph} years older than Maggie so he is {juliet_age}+{juliet_younger_than_ralph} = {ralph_age} years old
The sum of Maggie's and Ralph's ages is {maggie_age}+{ralph_age} = <<{maggie_age}+{ralph_age}={sum_ages}>>{sum_ages} years
